  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103269</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103269</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion de rayon de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light ray reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion des hellen Strahls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão do raio claro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione del raggio luminoso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση ελαφριών ακτίνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión del rayo ligero</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre à un rayon e lumière incident frappant la surface d'un miroir. Les emplacements de l'incidence et des angles reflétés sont indiqués.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an incident light ray striking the surface of a mirror. The locations of the incidence and reflected angles are indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">incidence angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle reflété</string>
            <string language="en">reflected angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einem Ereignis den hellen 
Strahl, der die Oberfläche eines Spiegels anschlägt. Die 
Standorte der Ausdehnung und die reflektierten Winkel werden 
angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a um incident o raio 
claro que golpeia a superfície de um espelho. As posições da 
incidência e os ângulos refletidos são indicados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad un avvenimento il 
raggio luminoso che colpisce la superficie di uno specchio. Le 
posizioni dell'incidenza e gli angoli riflessi sono indicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συναφή ελαφριά ακτίνα 
που χτυπά την επιφάνεια ενός καθρέφτη. Οι θέσεις της 
επίπτωσης και οι απεικονισμένες γωνίες είναι υποδειγμένες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a incidente el rayo 
ligero pulso la superficie de un espejo. Las localizaciones de 
la incidencia y los ángulos reflejados se indican.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">reflektierter Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo da incidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo refletido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo di incidenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo riflesso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθρέφτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτίνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απεικονισμένη γωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo de la incidencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rayo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo reflejado</string>
          </keyword>
